entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 13. POP 60%
